author: __kasey__
content: Have we considered running an additional goerli shadow fork once we have all the goerli release binaries (before 1/17)? This would allow us to get early data on potential issues, which seems warranted given last-minute changes in prysm. cc <@199561711278227457> <@412614104222531604>

author: parithosh
content: Yeah we can plan for it, small scale though - but should knock out trivial bugs. Takes ~2 days for sync + fork on our side.
